LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_HE.label: Nuclear Shot
LanguageData.Ammo_FatManShell_HE.description: This type has a greater damaging effect and radiation contamination. Increased damage is achieved at the cost of reduced range, which can turn out badly for a poorly protected shooter.
LanguageData.Bullet_FatManShell_HE.label: Nuclear Shot (NHE)
